front.title: Fast Macro Mobility Handovers in HMIPv6

abstract.t: In Hierarchical Mobile IPv6 (HMIPv6), a mobile node (MN) moving from one MAP domain to another can experience both long handover latency and packet loss due to the distance between the two MAPs. To solve the problems, this document describes two fast handover schemes that In Hierarchical Mobile IPv6 (HMIPv6), a mobile node (MN) moving from one MAP domain to another can experience both long handover latency and packet loss due to the distance between the two MAPs.
